rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3876, 3877, 3878, M6015}

unitName: Aeromedical and retrieval clinical 2: Intensive care
description: This unit specifically addresses the fundamental requirements for effective planning, leadership and the provision of definitive care for the complex retrieval and repatriation of sick and injured patients, both within the specialised aeromedical and also in non-specialised (commercial aircraft).
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
